attributes.bio: Amara maps the intersections of art, design, and social change. With a background in urban anthropology and an obsession with indie films, she’s always hunting for the next big thing—whether it’s a hidden city mural or a festival darling. Why she’s cool: Amara can talk your ear off about the socio-political subtext of street art and why the last five minutes of an A24 film broke her heart.
attributes.fullBio: Amara maps the intersections of art, design, and social change. With a background in urban anthropology and an obsession with indie films, she’s always hunting for the next big thing—whether it’s a hidden city mural or a festival darling.
attributes.quote: In every brushstroke of street art, there's a story waiting to be discovered; in every indie film frame, a revolution quietly unfurls.

featuredImage.caption: Amara Osei at a street art conference
